greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Version "mirror" of the shell model of partitions of A135010. Triangle read by rows: row n lists the parts of the last section of the set of partitions of n.
comment: In n is odd then row n lists the numbers of row n of A135010. If n is even the row n lists the 1's of row n of A135010 and then row n lists the other numbers of row n of A135010 in reverse order.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Feb 02 2011
